componentDescription: A customizable date selection input for user interfaces.

id.description: Unique identifier for the DatePicker component.

icon.description: Custom icon to display when the DatePicker is checked.

error.description: Indicates whether the DatePicker has an error.

helperText.description: Additional helper text that provides information about the field.

colorScheme.description: The color scheme that changes the background color of the DatePicker.

isReadOnly.description: If true, the DatePicker cannot be selected.

isDisabled.description: If true, the DatePicker will be unusable.

label.description: The label text for the field.

onChange.description: Callback function triggered when the DatePicker value changes.

onChangeText.description: Callback function triggered when the DatePicker value changes for IOS and Android.

styles.description: CSS styles for the DatePicker container and label.

shape.description: The shape that changes the outlines of the field.

variant.description: Changes the style of the field.

size.description: The size that sets the height and width of the DatePicker.

shadow.description: Adds a shadow effect to the DatePicker.

date.description: The selected date value as a string.

setDate.description: A function to set the selected date value.

isHovered.description: Flag indicating if the date picker is currently being hovered.

setIsHovered.description: A function to set the hovered state of the date picker.

isFocused.description: Flag indicating if the date picker is currently focused.

setIsFocused.description: A function to set the focus state of the date picker.
